title: 24 Best Outdoor Furniture Stores for Your Patio or Deck (2025)
description: All our favorite destinations for weatherproofed, elevated arrangements
author: Julia Harrison, Lori Keong
excerpt: Looking for the best outdoor furniture stores? Discover our top picks for patio furniture, including standout sofas, dining sets, fire pits, chaises, and more!
text: Your garden or patio should be curated and cared-for, not a desperate case for the Homeowners Association. Some ornamentation can help close the gap, and while the best outdoor furniture stores won’t drop by to weed your lawn, they will help with flying in some more seating arrangements, grills, and accessories like umbrellas and side tables—namely, all the window dressing you need to transform an average open-air space into an alfresco dreamscape.Naturally at AD we have a lot of opinions on what’s actually up to snuff in the outdoor arena, and we’re sharing some of our favorite shopping destinations across price points that tick a couple different boxes for us: good design (evidently), easy shipping, and a decent amount of variety. Quality goods are implied, and a couple things we’ve even had a chance to try firsthand. Without further ado, an AD-approved selection of heavy hitters in the outdoor space that will make your patio or garden sing.A Short List of the Best Outdoor Furniture Stores:For Serious Style Chops: NeighborFor Eco-Friendly Picks: OuterFor Budget-Friendly Styles: AmazonFor Clean, Contemporary Styles: West ElmFor Fun, Designer-Led Pieces: Lulu & GeorgiaOuterOuter Teak Outdoor Armless Chair (Set of 2)Brown Wicker Outdoor SofaEco-friendly fabrications and neutral-hued furnishings in gray, cream, and navyShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Small parcels ship free, freight for larger items starts at $275, white glove delivery & assembly availableReturns: Free within 365 days of delivery, though will incur a 20% return fee plus the cost of return shippingWarranties: Limited warranty offered on most collections, ranges from 5-10 years depending on the productManufactured with recycled materials, Outer is on a mission to make your garden space a little more green. Its pieces embody a classic coastal style that you and your grandmother can get behind, plus work with a durable selection of teak and aluminum and wicker that hold up after years baking in the sun. Customers tend to give Outer high marks for the ease of delivery and assembly, in case you’re looking for something relatively fuss-free. And while the brand doesn’t own any retail showrooms across the country, another perk is you can book an appointment with an Outer shopper in your area virtually or IRL to map out a customized layout based on your space and get more guidance on individual items.NeighborNeighbor Haven SofaNeighbor Teak Wood ChairModern silhouettes that have fun with typical outdoor performance fabricsShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $5, white glove delivery & assembly availableReturns: 45 day policyWarranties: Limited warranty offered on most collectionsOutdoor furniture so often feels like it belongs in another style category entirely (the land of metal bistro chairs and log cabin Adirondacks), but Neighbor makes its designs feel like something you could easily imagine in a modern living room or interior. Rich colors like rust, leaf, and ash give the furniture a surprising amount of versatility and you can even find inventive pieces like sexy wicker couches with built-in side tables. While style is the brand’s biggest ace, their designs also walk the walk with solid makeups that include quick-drying foam and weather-resistant fabrics like Sunbrella. There are a variety of options that all coexist together despite not necessarily hailing from the same collection, and everything is backed by a limited warranty.Serena & LilySerena & Lily Tofino Swivel ChairSerena & Lily Sundial Wide ChaiseAll coastal everything, from nautical blue stripes to wicker-and-white fabric combinationsShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $19, white glove & assembly availableReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: Limited warranty, depending on product typeChannel coastal vibes with Serena & Lily’s extensive collection of serene, beach-inspired furniture and home decor, including all-weather wicker options, sleek designs swathed in performance fabric, poolside lounge chairs, and much more. Serena & Lily’s team of design advisers will even collaborate with you to plan out furniture arrangements, pore over swatches, create mood boards, and so on. Basically, they will do everything they can to make your outdoor (or indoor) vision a reality from start to finish—and did we mention this service is free?ArticleLaholm Outdoor Chaise LoungeArticle Lubek Outdoor Low Corner SectionalAffordable outdoor finds under $1,500Shipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $19, white glove delivery & assembly available from $199Returns: 30-day policy on all orders, free exchangesWarranties: 1 year manufacturer’s warrantyIf you’re all in on Scandi-influenced, LA-presenting outdoor furniture, look no further than Article’s catalog. “After undertaking a huge backyard renovation, I was looking for a comfortable and stylish sofa to be the focal point of the space,” contributor Meg Kernahan told us in her review of the Article Lubek sectional. “This couch is exactly that: large enough to comfortably seat six people around an outdoor firepit and durable enough for my toddler to climb on.” We also recommend checking out the brand's chaise lounges, outdoor dining pieces, and various decor like throw pillows and outdoor rugs.YardbirdYardbird Rectangular Fire TableYardbird Winnie Conversation SetEco-friendly designs that lean on quality versus a lot of experimentation with new stylesShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: From $145 per order regardless of order size, white glove & assembly availableReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: Three year warranty for all products, Sunbrella fabric has a five year warranty and frames have a 10 year warrantyYardbird’s eco-friendly furniture is created using recycled materials, and their commitment to sustainability extends to their packaging and manufacturing. Taking inspiration from English gardens to West Coast living, you’ll find a small range of decorative styles to meld with your aesthetic. Yardbird also has a number of showrooms around the country, so you can mull over certain pieces in-store before making a decision.WayfairAllModern Farrah Outdoor Dining SetAllModern Abra Metal Outdoor LoveseatA vast selection of budget-friendly finds, though not much curationShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $5Returns: 30-day policyWarranties: Dependent on product, though Wayfair does offer product protection plansIf you’re a dedicated coupon clipper, Wayfair is where you’ll find all the deals on outdoor furnishings: The mega online retailer is known for flash sales and coupons which you can combine with everyday discounts. In addition to selling some of our favorite outdoor dining sets, fire pits, and outdoor rugs, Wayfair also sells outdoor fencing and flooring, lighting, garden equipment, heating and cooling equipment—plus hot tubs and saunas for year-round coziness. To sweeten the deal, delivery is free on orders over $49, but just be sure to read over the reviews—as quality and functionality can vary. Our senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums told us the Abra loveseat is a chic option for socializing with family and friends. “It blends well with different outdoor aesthetics, especially if you’re into a clean, minimalist look.”Pottery BarnPottery Barn Indio Coastal Mahogany & Rope 3-Piece Outdoor Furniture SetPottery Barn Indio Metal Extendable Outdoor Dining Table + Chair SetTimeless designs and a wide range of high-quality furniture and decor offerings that customers can shop both online and in-storeShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Flat-rate shipping: Starts at $5.95, white glove delivery & assembly available from $159Returns: 30-day policy on all orders, free exchangesWhat other furniture brand do you know that had a whole Friends episode revolve around its wares? A household mainstay that’s also named in our best furniture stores story, Pottery Barn’s robust selection of outdoor furniture ranges from classic to contemporary and is available to shop online no matter where you live (you can also make an in-store visit if you’re located in North America). We like that the retailer stocks not only individual pieces, but full sets so you’re able to grab an outdoor sofa and lounge chair that perfectly compliment each other (like the Indio set). Plus, the brand often sources sustainable materials like recycled and responsibly sourced wood and textiles.RejuvenationRejuvenation Swanson Outdoor Dining TableRejuvenation Zander Solar Path LightContemporary decor and furnishings versatile enough to blend in with any decor aestheticShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Flat-rate shipping: Starts at $5.95, white glove delivery & assembly available from $159Returns: 30-day policy on all orders, free exchangesRejuvenation shares a similar look and style to its sister brand Pottery Barn (classic, American-leaning) and also stocks full furniture sets for any sprawling backyard. If you want to create a patio that looks straight out of an AD issue (but don’t want to spend too much time on the specifics), we’d highly recommend ordering matching pieces from the same collection for a cohesive look. The Swanson dining set is a family of sleek-looking pieces that cater to modern tastes, while the Bayocean collection includes both dining options as well as lounge furniture to fully outfit a space. If you’re looking to complete the vibe, Rejuvenation is best known for its lighting options from solar path lights to outdoor pendants and more.POLYWOODPolywood Lakeside 4-Piece Deep Seating SetPolywood Vineyard Curveback 3-Piece Adirondack Rocking Chair SetTraditional silhouettes in a wide variety of shades, whether you’re building a neutral patio space or are looking to experiment with colorShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Free shipping, white glove delivery & assembly available for an additional fee calculated at checkoutReturns: 30-day policy on all ordersWarranty: 20 yearsPolywood’s pieces channel classic and traditional outdoor designs that can live on the patio, around the pool, or on the porch. The brand’s wooden furniture is UV-protected and color is fully integrated into the lumber—meaning your Adirondack chairs won’t fade in the sun or drip paint after rainy days—while the stainless steel-based designs are reinforced with a coating that resists weather corrosion. Shop the brand’s collection for highly durable couches, pool loungers, stools, dining sets, and so much more. You can even mix and match different pieces of furniture but order them in the same color to create clever cohesion.ArhausArhaus Canyon Outdoor Teak SofaArhaus Sevilla Outdoor Swivel ChairCasually elegant furniture and decor worth investing inShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Flat-rate shipping: Starts at $9, white glove delivery & assembly available from $299Returns: 14-day policy on all ordersWarranty: 2-5 yearsIn addition to the splurge-worthy sectional sofa our contributor Kat Kovac called “incredibly well made,” Arhaus (German for house) offers lots of high-end, heirloom-quality outdoor furniture that we could easily picture poolside in a celebrity home. The Scandi-inspired Canyon sofa is an example of a classic silhouette that can fit in any modern outdoor space. Since it has a simpler design, you can really dress it up with a statement chair like the Sevilla, as well as some bold outdoor lighting and a splashy rug to really ground the setup.Lulu and GeorgiaLulu and Georgia Gally ChaiseLulu and Georgia Telford Side TableStylish, designer-led selections in collaboration with well-established names like Sarah Sherman SamuelShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $9, most products ship within 5-7 business days, white glove delivery & assembly availableReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: Not listedIf you’re looking for a statement piece of outdoor furniture, chances are you’ll find something that catches your eye from California-based Lulu and Georgia. The brand’s highly curated selection of outdoor living essentials elevate classic silhouettes, spanning teak lounge chairs to side tables. Each piece is special and looks like something you’d find straight out of a designer’s studio. In fact, the brand consistently works with top designers from around the world to offer dialed-in furniture collections. This is a great place to shop if custom work isn’t within your budget but you still want something special.West ElmWest Elm Santa Cruz Outdoor Stacking Dining Chair (Set of 2)West Elm Monti Side TableMidcentury-leaning style at a range of price pointsShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $6, white glove delivery & assembly availableReturns: 30-day policy or 7 days for quick-ship upholstery itemsWarranties: 3-year protection plans for furniture, rugs and lighting, 5-year mattress protector planChances are you’re already familiar with West Elm’s pieces for interior living spaces, but the retailer brings the same energy, intentionality, and contemporary aesthetic to their backyard and patio collections as well. Pieces feel luxe-on-a-budget and comfortable, plus made with high-quality materials. Another thing we love is the constant rotation of designs—chances are, you’ll see something new every time you visit the site or store. From accents for small spaces to patio umbrellas, there’s plenty of outdoor patio furniture to peruse.Design Within ReachDesign Within Reach Terassi ChaiseHAY Palissade Cord Dining BenchIconic design pieces and exclusives from brands like HAYShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $15, Typical delivery is 3-7 business days from shipment date, white glove delivery & assembly availableReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: 1 year warranty on all products, brand-specific warranties may extend to longer periodsDesign Within Reach’s elevated aesthetic brings a certain IYKYK sophistication to any backyard. The brand also has exclusive rights to a number of iconic designs and brands (like HAY), so it’s always worth checking for special colorways or fabrics if you’re looking for a very specific piece of furniture.Soho HomeSoho Home Wunder Fire PitSoho Home Ardingly Outdoor LoungerUpscale, ’70s-leaning pieces for a retro vibeShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $15, free on orders over $250, white glove & assembly availableReturns: 28-day policyWarranties: Not specifiedFor anyone pining for the aesthetic of a Slim Aarons photo, Soho Home has delivered with a new line of outdoor staples that looks back (tastefully) into the past, digging up striped cabana chairs from the ’70s and earthy, weathered steel fire pits that look like they’ve been teleported from the same timeframe. Start here for pieces with a POV that don’t look like other cookie-cutter wicker or teak designs, and recapture the glamour of a bygone era.CastleryCastlery Maui Outdoor Lounge Chair SetCastlery Rio Outdoor Teak SofaContemporary, minimal designs at a mid-range price pointShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Free on orders with a subtotal of $1,399 or more, white glove & assembly availableReturns: 14-day policyWarranties: Dependent on product type, ranges from 1-10 year warrantyDigging through Castlery’s site, you'll find lots of texture and luxe-looking silhouettes. If you have expensive taste and don’t want to drop $10,000 on a dining set, chances are Castlery has something for you. Many pieces mix dark (weatherproofed) textiles with natural wood, an expert combination for an elevated backyard. Our contributor Stewart Savin told us her Rio sofa “has withstood pollen, snowstorms, thunderstorms, and even a hurricane. With ample seating space and foam-filled cushions, you’ll want to curl up on this sofa with your morning coffee or after-dinner wine all year long.“ The brand gives off minimalist, but cozy vibes for people who love a bouclé moment or a neutral color palette. There may not be as many options to choose from as a big-box store, but curation and high quality designs are a given.Crate & BarrelCrate & Barrel Adirondack ChairCrate & Barrel Ipanema Wicker Outdoor Lounge ChairRemixes of the classics, from Adirondacks to wicker chairs, sometimes in collaboration with top designersShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $6, average delivery in 3-5 business daysReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: 1-2 year warranty depending on product typeCrate & Barrel has a robust section dedicated to outdoor living whose bestsellers include nature-inspired seating sets, sculptural side tables, and sophisticated seating. While their sister brand CB2’s options skew more modern, Crate & Barrel fuses timelessness with contemporary designs (as evidenced by the luxe Adirondack chair below). Plus, a good selection of the furniture you see online can be seen in person at one of the company’s many brick-and-mortar stores.Tom DixonTom Dixon Groove Side Chair MossTom Dixon Groove Stool PuttyA small line of curated metal furnishingsShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $15, free on orders over $99 days with some exceptionsReturns: 14-day policyWarranties: One year warrantyLighting and furniture designer Tom Dixon recently made his first foray into the outdoor space with a small selection of grooved pieces that feature lightweight, stackable aluminum bent into playful curves and rounded forms. A decade of research went into these charming designs, which are fairly affordable at under $1,500 (with the chairs and stools falling well under $500).CB2CB2 Breton Black Metal Outdoor SofaCB2 Bizerte Outdoor Armless ChairVery sleek and modern designs that feel like elevated vintage piecesShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $6, standard delivery in 3-5 business daysReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: Not listedAs we mentioned, CB2 skews more minimalist and modern, if you want your garden to have an upscale look that’s in keeping with the times. Need a backyard or patio design consultation? They do that too. Their designers will create mood boards and room renderings to help you bring your outdoor space to life. The quality and delivery process is pretty standard (in a good way) for a massive retailer. Reviews have noted quick ship times, but make sure the piece you’re looking to purchase is in stock before buying. A good number of items have longer lead times—as long as you know what to expect, you’re good.AnthropologieAnthropologie Denver Outdoor SofaAnthropologie Peacock Indoor/Outdoor Hanging ChairBohemian-influenced styles and elevated classicsShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $7, standard shipping in 4-8 business daysReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: Not specifiedOur favorite Anthropologie outdoor finds include mosaic tabletops, patterned outdoor sofas, garden chairs, ceramic stools, and ornate hanging chairs like the one pictured here, but you can also find plenty of classic pieces among the retailer’s more bohemian wares like this evergreen sofa. Shipping tends to be quick and the brand has a loyal following—there are certain pieces that are coveted long after stock sells out.Blu DotBludot NowThen Outdoor Coffee TableBludot Ridge Outdoor SofaExperimental designs with sharp angles and contemporary silhouettesShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $9, white glove & assembly availableReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: Five year warrantyThis Minneapolis-based retailer is all about offering new, considered takes on traditional furnishings. Take the stark, Judd-esque lines of this coffee table, or the stacked steppe feel of the Ridge outdoor sofa seen above. The colorways are also fun and the designs are fresh, if you want your outdoor space to look a little less like the Joneses next door.AmazonFlamaker 4-Piece Acacia Wood Patio SetWalker Edison Acacia Wood Patio Dining TableLots and lots of variety, from affordable patio sets to accessories and side tablesShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Prime members get free or discounted shipping, expedited delivery available dependent on the productReturns: 30-day policy, though depends on brandWarranties: Warranty dependent on the manufacturerNo surprise here: The “Everything Store” is brimming with budget-friendly gems to round out your barebones patio or backyard. Though more than 20,000 pieces of patio furniture on its digital shelves can feel overwhelming to parse through, you can filter your search to find exactly what you want (a specific type of umbrella, say, or something that’s produced in a more eco-friendly and sustainable way). Or you can read up on our favorite Amazon outdoor furniture pieces that balance affordability with durability and style.SundaysSundays Make Room Outdoor Extendable Dining TableSundays Movie Night Outdoor 4-Piece Modular SectionalClean elegance and a very curated selectionShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Complimentary delivery on all items, free set up and removal of packaging for large items such as sofas and sectionalsReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: Two year warrantySundays has a novel take on outdoor furniture: Classic lines with modern quirks. They carry a curated line of outdoor essentials—extending to tables, dining chairs, and sofas—elevated with playful touches like chubby legs and armless arrangements. The Movie Night outdoor sectional, tested by our contributor Will Porter, is a particular standout against the cookie cutter rattan designs you'll find at a lot of mass retailers. “It matches any design style and, thanks to a clever modular design, can be arranged in a number of ways to get the right fit in your space,” he says.BurrowBurrow Dunes Teak Dining SetBurrow Dunes Teak 8-Piece U-SectionalBasics, but better: Teak dining sets and sectional sets with extra polish to themShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Flat rate: orders over $500 cost $49, orders between $100 and $500 cost $19, and anything less than $100 ships freeReturns: 30-day policyWarranties: One year warrantyBurrow, best known for its flat-packed couches in a box, also makes seating arrangements for the outdoors. If you’re big into entertaining, Burrow offers a wide selection of furniture and dining options that can seat up to 12 people for outdoor movie nights, extended family dinners, garden parties, you name it.McGee & Co.McGee & Co. Haviland Coffee TableMcGee & Co. Gilda Outdoor Lounge ChairCoastal-influenced outdoor picks and cleanly designed lounge seatingShipping, Returns, and WarrantiesShipping: Starts at $8.50, free for orders over $150Returns: 30-day policyWarranties: Package Protection Plan covers orders up to $15,000McGee & Co. is better known for their rustic indoor furnishings, but have a small curation of styles to offer for your backyard, too. Rounded wicker coffee tables and sides tables are a highlight, with sweet braided edging that are an example of some of the finer details the brand is known for. Otherwise, come here for updates on classics, like this outdoor lounge chair that looks like the next stage of evolution from a basic Adirondack.How to Shop the Best Outdoor Furniture StoresWhether you’re hoping to kick back with pals or touch grass all by your lonesome, a comfortable outdoor space is a happy space. But because buying outdoor furniture can be such a big investment, here are a few things to consider before you add that sectional set to cart:Measure, measure, measure! While there may be fewer space concerns in the wide expanses of the outdoors, you should still take a look at how wide a sofa is or how deep the seat sits before going all in on a purchase.On that note, scan the return policies in case what you decide on doesn’t quite fit your backyard. Getting outdoor furniture shipped out (and then figuring out a way to return it all) can be a massive pain in the neck, so check what actually fits the bill for a full or partial refund if you’re less than satisfied.Don’t forget the power of a warranty (the elements can do a number on outdoor furniture!).Go in with a plan—think of how you want people to flow throughout the space and buy furniture that supports that strategy. (For example, a big dining table may not be the answer if you dream of small nooks for people to chit-chat in the garden.)Choose fabrics like rust-proof metal and Sunbrella fabrics that are known for being fade-resistant.Look over the “care” section of each furniture item. Some of the fabrics just aren’t built for regular deluges and sun exposure, so you may have to buy additional covers for them or bring them indoors when they’re not in use.Build The Ultimate Yardscape With ADBest Outdoor Sofas, Tested and Reviewed: Get inspired to find new seating options with these AD tried-and-tested picks that combine stylish silhouettes with weatherproofed fabrics.Best Outdoor Dining Sets: Invite a whole crew out to the backyard with these setups that encourage alfresco feasting.Best Amazon Outdoor Furniture: Our curated selection of wallet-friendly pieces is proof that you don’t need to spend a fortune to find some flatpacked gems for your backyard space.Best Bistro Sets: Lean into French café culture with a set that lets you comfortably people watch and wine and dine on your very own premises.Best Hammocks: Here are all the indoor-outdoor styles we’ve been influenced by celebs to try in our own homes.Best Teak Outdoor Furniture: A deeper dive into all the wonders of the rich, patina-friendly material that goes into so many outdoor pieces.Best Outdoor Rugs: These aren’t just places to kick off dust and debris, but also a stylish segue into your interiors.
html:
Your garden or patio should be curated and cared-for, not a desperate case for the Homeowners Association. Some ornamentation can help close the gap, and while the best outdoor furniture stores won’t drop by to weed your lawn, they will help with flying in some more seating arrangements, grills, and accessories like umbrellas and side tables—namely, all the window dressing you need to transform an average open-air space into an alfresco dreamscape.

Naturally at AD we have a lot of opinions on what’s actually up to snuff in the outdoor arena, and we’re sharing some of our favorite shopping destinations across price points that tick a couple different boxes for us: good design (evidently), easy shipping, and a decent amount of variety. Quality goods are implied, and a couple things we’ve even had a chance to try firsthand. Without further ado, an AD-approved selection of heavy hitters in the outdoor space that will make your patio or garden sing.

A Short List of the Best Outdoor Furniture Stores:

  • For Serious Style Chops: Neighbor
  • For Eco-Friendly Picks: Outer
  • For Budget-Friendly Styles: Amazon
  • For Clean, Contemporary Styles: West Elm
  • For Fun, Designer-Led Pieces: Lulu & Georgia

Outer

Outer Teak Outdoor Armless Chair (Set of 2)

Brown Wicker Outdoor Sofa

Eco-friendly fabrications and neutral-hued furnishings in gray, cream, and navy

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Small parcels ship free, freight for larger items starts at $275, white glove delivery & assembly available
  • Returns: Free within 365 days of delivery, though will incur a 20% return fee plus the cost of return shipping
  • Warranties: Limited warranty offered on most collections, ranges from 5-10 years depending on the product

Manufactured with recycled materials, Outer is on a mission to make your garden space a little more green. Its pieces embody a classic coastal style that you and your grandmother can get behind, plus work with a durable selection of teak and aluminum and wicker that hold up after years baking in the sun. Customers tend to give Outer high marks for the ease of delivery and assembly, in case you’re looking for something relatively fuss-free. And while the brand doesn’t own any retail showrooms across the country, another perk is you can book an appointment with an Outer shopper in your area virtually or IRL to map out a customized layout based on your space and get more guidance on individual items.

Neighbor

Neighbor Haven Sofa

Neighbor Teak Wood Chair

Modern silhouettes that have fun with typical outdoor performance fabrics

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $5, white glove delivery & assembly available
  • Returns: 45 day policy
  • Warranties: Limited warranty offered on most collections

Outdoor furniture so often feels like it belongs in another style category entirely (the land of metal bistro chairs and log cabin Adirondacks), but Neighbor makes its designs feel like something you could easily imagine in a modern living room or interior. Rich colors like rust, leaf, and ash give the furniture a surprising amount of versatility and you can even find inventive pieces like sexy wicker couches with built-in side tables. While style is the brand’s biggest ace, their designs also walk the walk with solid makeups that include quick-drying foam and weather-resistant fabrics like Sunbrella. There are a variety of options that all coexist together despite not necessarily hailing from the same collection, and everything is backed by a limited warranty.

Serena & Lily

Serena & Lily Tofino Swivel Chair

Serena & Lily Sundial Wide Chaise

All coastal everything, from nautical blue stripes to wicker-and-white fabric combinations

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $19, white glove & assembly available
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: Limited warranty, depending on product type

Channel coastal vibes with Serena & Lily’s extensive collection of serene, beach-inspired furniture and home decor, including all-weather wicker options, sleek designs swathed in performance fabric, poolside lounge chairs, and much more. Serena & Lily’s team of design advisers will even collaborate with you to plan out furniture arrangements, pore over swatches, create mood boards, and so on. Basically, they will do everything they can to make your outdoor (or indoor) vision a reality from start to finish—and did we mention this service is free?

Article

Laholm Outdoor Chaise Lounge

Article Lubek Outdoor Low Corner Sectional

Affordable outdoor finds under $1,500

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $19, white glove delivery & assembly available from $199
  • Returns: 30-day policy on all orders, free exchanges
  • Warranties: 1 year manufacturer’s warranty

If you’re all in on Scandi-influenced, LA-presenting outdoor furniture, look no further than Article’s catalog. “After undertaking a huge backyard renovation, I was looking for a comfortable and stylish sofa to be the focal point of the space,” contributor Meg Kernahan told us in her review of the Article Lubek sectional. “This couch is exactly that: large enough to comfortably seat six people around an outdoor firepit and durable enough for my toddler to climb on.” We also recommend checking out the brand's chaise lounges, outdoor dining pieces, and various decor like throw pillows and outdoor rugs.

Yardbird

Yardbird Rectangular Fire Table

Yardbird Winnie Conversation Set

Eco-friendly designs that lean on quality versus a lot of experimentation with new styles

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: From $145 per order regardless of order size, white glove & assembly available
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: Three year warranty for all products, Sunbrella fabric has a five year warranty and frames have a 10 year warranty

Yardbird’s eco-friendly furniture is created using recycled materials, and their commitment to sustainability extends to their packaging and manufacturing. Taking inspiration from English gardens to West Coast living, you’ll find a small range of decorative styles to meld with your aesthetic. Yardbird also has a number of showrooms around the country, so you can mull over certain pieces in-store before making a decision.

Wayfair

AllModern Farrah Outdoor Dining Set

AllModern Abra Metal Outdoor Loveseat

A vast selection of budget-friendly finds, though not much curation

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $5
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: Dependent on product, though Wayfair does offer product protection plans

If you’re a dedicated coupon clipper, Wayfair is where you’ll find all the deals on outdoor furnishings: The mega online retailer is known for flash sales and coupons which you can combine with everyday discounts. In addition to selling some of our favorite outdoor dining sets, fire pits, and outdoor rugs, Wayfair also sells outdoor fencing and flooring, lighting, garden equipment, heating and cooling equipment—plus hot tubs and saunas for year-round coziness. To sweeten the deal, delivery is free on orders over $49, but just be sure to read over the reviews—as quality and functionality can vary. Our senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums told us the Abra loveseat is a chic option for socializing with family and friends. “It blends well with different outdoor aesthetics, especially if you’re into a clean, minimalist look.”

Pottery Barn

Pottery Barn Indio Coastal Mahogany & Rope 3-Piece Outdoor Furniture Set

Pottery Barn Indio Metal Extendable Outdoor Dining Table + Chair Set

Timeless designs and a wide range of high-quality furniture and decor offerings that customers can shop both online and in-storeShipping, Returns, and Warranties

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Flat-rate shipping: Starts at $5.95, white glove delivery & assembly available from $159
  • Returns: 30-day policy on all orders, free exchanges

What other furniture brand do you know that had a whole Friends episode revolve around its wares? A household mainstay that’s also named in our best furniture stores story, Pottery Barn’s robust selection of outdoor furniture ranges from classic to contemporary and is available to shop online no matter where you live (you can also make an in-store visit if you’re located in North America). We like that the retailer stocks not only individual pieces, but full sets so you’re able to grab an outdoor sofa and lounge chair that perfectly compliment each other (like the Indio set). Plus, the brand often sources sustainable materials like recycled and responsibly sourced wood and textiles.

Rejuvenation

Rejuvenation Swanson Outdoor Dining Table

Rejuvenation Zander Solar Path Light

Contemporary decor and furnishings versatile enough to blend in with any decor aesthetic

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Flat-rate shipping: Starts at $5.95, white glove delivery & assembly available from $159
  • Returns: 30-day policy on all orders, free exchanges

Rejuvenation shares a similar look and style to its sister brand Pottery Barn (classic, American-leaning) and also stocks full furniture sets for any sprawling backyard. If you want to create a patio that looks straight out of an AD issue (but don’t want to spend too much time on the specifics), we’d highly recommend ordering matching pieces from the same collection for a cohesive look. The Swanson dining set is a family of sleek-looking pieces that cater to modern tastes, while the Bayocean collection includes both dining options as well as lounge furniture to fully outfit a space. If you’re looking to complete the vibe, Rejuvenation is best known for its lighting options from solar path lights to outdoor pendants and more.

POLYWOOD

Polywood Lakeside 4-Piece Deep Seating Set

Polywood Vineyard Curveback 3-Piece Adirondack Rocking Chair Set

Traditional silhouettes in a wide variety of shades, whether you’re building a neutral patio space or are looking to experiment with color

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Free shipping, white glove delivery & assembly available for an additional fee calculated at checkout
  • Returns: 30-day policy on all orders
  • Warranty: 20 years

Polywood’s pieces channel classic and traditional outdoor designs that can live on the patio, around the pool, or on the porch. The brand’s wooden furniture is UV-protected and color is fully integrated into the lumber—meaning your Adirondack chairs won’t fade in the sun or drip paint after rainy days—while the stainless steel-based designs are reinforced with a coating that resists weather corrosion. Shop the brand’s collection for highly durable couches, pool loungers, stools, dining sets, and so much more. You can even mix and match different pieces of furniture but order them in the same color to create clever cohesion.

Arhaus

Arhaus Canyon Outdoor Teak Sofa

Arhaus Sevilla Outdoor Swivel Chair

Casually elegant furniture and decor worth investing in

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Flat-rate shipping: Starts at $9, white glove delivery & assembly available from $299
  • Returns: 14-day policy on all orders
  • Warranty: 2-5 years

In addition to the splurge-worthy sectional sofa our contributor Kat Kovac called “incredibly well made,” Arhaus (German for house) offers lots of high-end, heirloom-quality outdoor furniture that we could easily picture poolside in a celebrity home. The Scandi-inspired Canyon sofa is an example of a classic silhouette that can fit in any modern outdoor space. Since it has a simpler design, you can really dress it up with a statement chair like the Sevilla, as well as some bold outdoor lighting and a splashy rug to really ground the setup.

Lulu and Georgia

Lulu and Georgia Gally Chaise

Lulu and Georgia Telford Side Table

Stylish, designer-led selections in collaboration with well-established names like Sarah Sherman Samuel

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $9, most products ship within 5-7 business days, white glove delivery & assembly available
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: Not listed

If you’re looking for a statement piece of outdoor furniture, chances are you’ll find something that catches your eye from California-based Lulu and Georgia. The brand’s highly curated selection of outdoor living essentials elevate classic silhouettes, spanning teak lounge chairs to side tables. Each piece is special and looks like something you’d find straight out of a designer’s studio. In fact, the brand consistently works with top designers from around the world to offer dialed-in furniture collections. This is a great place to shop if custom work isn’t within your budget but you still want something special.

West Elm

West Elm Santa Cruz Outdoor Stacking Dining Chair (Set of 2)

West Elm Monti Side Table

Midcentury-leaning style at a range of price points

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $6, white glove delivery & assembly available
  • Returns: 30-day policy or 7 days for quick-ship upholstery items
  • Warranties: 3-year protection plans for furniture, rugs and lighting, 5-year mattress protector plan

Chances are you’re already familiar with West Elm’s pieces for interior living spaces, but the retailer brings the same energy, intentionality, and contemporary aesthetic to their backyard and patio collections as well. Pieces feel luxe-on-a-budget and comfortable, plus made with high-quality materials. Another thing we love is the constant rotation of designs—chances are, you’ll see something new every time you visit the site or store. From accents for small spaces to patio umbrellas, there’s plenty of outdoor patio furniture to peruse.

Design Within Reach

Design Within Reach Terassi Chaise

HAY Palissade Cord Dining Bench

Iconic design pieces and exclusives from brands like HAY

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $15, Typical delivery is 3-7 business days from shipment date, white glove delivery & assembly available
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: 1 year warranty on all products, brand-specific warranties may extend to longer periods

Design Within Reach’s elevated aesthetic brings a certain IYKYK sophistication to any backyard. The brand also has exclusive rights to a number of iconic designs and brands (like HAY), so it’s always worth checking for special colorways or fabrics if you’re looking for a very specific piece of furniture.

Soho Home

Soho Home Wunder Fire Pit

Soho Home Ardingly Outdoor Lounger

Upscale, ’70s-leaning pieces for a retro vibe

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $15, free on orders over $250, white glove & assembly available
  • Returns: 28-day policy
  • Warranties: Not specified

For anyone pining for the aesthetic of a Slim Aarons photo, Soho Home has delivered with a new line of outdoor staples that looks back (tastefully) into the past, digging up striped cabana chairs from the ’70s and earthy, weathered steel fire pits that look like they’ve been teleported from the same timeframe. Start here for pieces with a POV that don’t look like other cookie-cutter wicker or teak designs, and recapture the glamour of a bygone era.

Castlery

Castlery Maui Outdoor Lounge Chair Set

Castlery Rio Outdoor Teak Sofa

Contemporary, minimal designs at a mid-range price point

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Free on orders with a subtotal of $1,399 or more, white glove & assembly available
  • Returns: 14-day policy
  • Warranties: Dependent on product type, ranges from 1-10 year warranty

Digging through Castlery’s site, you'll find lots of texture and luxe-looking silhouettes. If you have expensive taste and don’t want to drop $10,000 on a dining set, chances are Castlery has something for you. Many pieces mix dark (weatherproofed) textiles with natural wood, an expert combination for an elevated backyard. Our contributor Stewart Savin told us her Rio sofa “has withstood pollen, snowstorms, thunderstorms, and even a hurricane. With ample seating space and foam-filled cushions, you’ll want to curl up on this sofa with your morning coffee or after-dinner wine all year long.“ The brand gives off minimalist, but cozy vibes for people who love a bouclé moment or a neutral color palette. There may not be as many options to choose from as a big-box store, but curation and high quality designs are a given.

Crate & Barrel Adirondack Chair

Crate & Barrel Ipanema Wicker Outdoor Lounge Chair

Remixes of the classics, from Adirondacks to wicker chairs, sometimes in collaboration with top designers

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $6, average delivery in 3-5 business days
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: 1-2 year warranty depending on product type

Crate & Barrel has a robust section dedicated to outdoor living whose bestsellers include nature-inspired seating sets, sculptural side tables, and sophisticated seating. While their sister brand CB2’s options skew more modern, Crate & Barrel fuses timelessness with contemporary designs (as evidenced by the luxe Adirondack chair below). Plus, a good selection of the furniture you see online can be seen in person at one of the company’s many brick-and-mortar stores.

Tom Dixon

Tom Dixon Groove Side Chair Moss

Tom Dixon Groove Stool Putty

A small line of curated metal furnishings

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $15, free on orders over $99 days with some exceptions
  • Returns: 14-day policy
  • Warranties: One year warranty

Lighting and furniture designer Tom Dixon recently made his first foray into the outdoor space with a small selection of grooved pieces that feature lightweight, stackable aluminum bent into playful curves and rounded forms. A decade of research went into these charming designs, which are fairly affordable at under $1,500 (with the chairs and stools falling well under $500).

CB2

CB2 Breton Black Metal Outdoor Sofa

CB2 Bizerte Outdoor Armless Chair

Very sleek and modern designs that feel like elevated vintage pieces

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $6, standard delivery in 3-5 business days
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: Not listed

As we mentioned, CB2 skews more minimalist and modern, if you want your garden to have an upscale look that’s in keeping with the times. Need a backyard or patio design consultation? They do that too. Their designers will create mood boards and room renderings to help you bring your outdoor space to life. The quality and delivery process is pretty standard (in a good way) for a massive retailer. Reviews have noted quick ship times, but make sure the piece you’re looking to purchase is in stock before buying. A good number of items have longer lead times—as long as you know what to expect, you’re good.

Anthropologie

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Warranties: Not specified

Our favorite Anthropologie outdoor finds include mosaic tabletops, patterned outdoor sofas, garden chairs, ceramic stools, and ornate hanging chairs like the one pictured here, but you can also find plenty of classic pieces among the retailer’s more bohemian wares like this evergreen sofa. Shipping tends to be quick and the brand has a loyal following—there are certain pieces that are coveted long after stock sells out.

Blu Dot

Bludot NowThen Outdoor Coffee Table

Bludot Ridge Outdoor Sofa

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

This Minneapolis-based retailer is all about offering new, considered takes on traditional furnishings. Take the stark, Judd-esque lines of this coffee table, or the stacked steppe feel of the Ridge outdoor sofa seen above. The colorways are also fun and the designs are fresh, if you want your outdoor space to look a little less like the Joneses next door.

Amazon

Flamaker 4-Piece Acacia Wood Patio Set

Walker Edison Acacia Wood Patio Dining Table

Lots and lots of variety, from affordable patio sets to accessories and side tables

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Prime members get free or discounted shipping, expedited delivery available dependent on the product
  • Returns: 30-day policy, though depends on brand
  • Warranties: Warranty dependent on the manufacturer

No surprise here: The “Everything Store” is brimming with budget-friendly gems to round out your barebones patio or backyard. Though more than 20,000 pieces of patio furniture on its digital shelves can feel overwhelming to parse through, you can filter your search to find exactly what you want (a specific type of umbrella, say, or something that’s produced in a more eco-friendly and sustainable way). Or you can read up on our favorite Amazon outdoor furniture pieces that balance affordability with durability and style.

Sundays

Sundays Make Room Outdoor Extendable Dining Table

Sundays Movie Night Outdoor 4-Piece Modular Sectional

Clean elegance and a very curated selection

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Complimentary delivery on all items, free set up and removal of packaging for large items such as sofas and sectionals
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: Two year warranty

Sundays has a novel take on outdoor furniture: Classic lines with modern quirks. They carry a curated line of outdoor essentials—extending to tables, dining chairs, and sofas—elevated with playful touches like chubby legs and armless arrangements. The Movie Night outdoor sectional, tested by our contributor Will Porter, is a particular standout against the cookie cutter rattan designs you'll find at a lot of mass retailers. “It matches any design style and, thanks to a clever modular design, can be arranged in a number of ways to get the right fit in your space,” he says.

Burrow

Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set

Burrow Dunes Teak 8-Piece U-Sectional

Basics, but better: Teak dining sets and sectional sets with extra polish to them

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Flat rate: orders over $500 cost $49, orders between $100 and $500 cost $19, and anything less than $100 ships free
  • Returns: 30-day policy

Burrow, best known for its flat-packed couches in a box, also makes seating arrangements for the outdoors. If you’re big into entertaining, Burrow offers a wide selection of furniture and dining options that can seat up to 12 people for outdoor movie nights, extended family dinners, garden parties, you name it.

McGee & Co.

McGee & Co. Haviland Coffee Table

McGee & Co. Gilda Outdoor Lounge Chair

Coastal-influenced outdoor picks and cleanly designed lounge seating

Shipping, Returns, and Warranties

  • Shipping: Starts at $8.50, free for orders over $150
  • Returns: 30-day policy
  • Warranties: Package Protection Plan covers orders up to $15,000

McGee & Co. is better known for their rustic indoor furnishings, but have a small curation of styles to offer for your backyard, too. Rounded wicker coffee tables and sides tables are a highlight, with sweet braided edging that are an example of some of the finer details the brand is known for. Otherwise, come here for updates on classics, like this outdoor lounge chair that looks like the next stage of evolution from a basic Adirondack.

How to Shop the Best Outdoor Furniture Stores

Whether you’re hoping to kick back with pals or touch grass all by your lonesome, a comfortable outdoor space is a happy space. But because buying outdoor furniture can be such a big investment, here are a few things to consider before you add that sectional set to cart:

  • Measure, measure, measure! While there may be fewer space concerns in the wide expanses of the outdoors, you should still take a look at how wide a sofa is or how deep the seat sits before going all in on a purchase.
  • On that note, scan the return policies in case what you decide on doesn’t quite fit your backyard. Getting outdoor furniture shipped out (and then figuring out a way to return it all) can be a massive pain in the neck, so check what actually fits the bill for a full or partial refund if you’re less than satisfied.
  • Don’t forget the power of a warranty (the elements can do a number on outdoor furniture!).
  • Go in with a plan—think of how you want people to flow throughout the space and buy furniture that supports that strategy. (For example, a big dining table may not be the answer if you dream of small nooks for people to chit-chat in the garden.)
  • Choose fabrics like rust-proof metal and Sunbrella fabrics that are known for being fade-resistant.
  • Look over the “care” section of each furniture item. Some of the fabrics just aren’t built for regular deluges and sun exposure, so you may have to buy additional covers for them or bring them indoors when they’re not in use.
